posts.post_content: honestly, you all are focused to much on what the card looks like and not what it can do. I run four in my vampire deck. all you have to do is run a bunch of weenies like pulse tracker and gruul draz vampire and the lacerator, and then turn three play the captivating it makes them stronger and anything they play that makes a big threat take it, i beat my friends white weenie deck all the time with this. because he will play baneslayer and i'll be like ok cool now i get a 5/5 angel vampire hybrid badass turn ur opponents strongest creatures against them. its a lot faster and more useful the the roil elemental. im just saying.

posts.post_content:
I wonder how this card would have rated if it didn't have [Vampire Nocturnus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nocturnus) to live up to. I like this card; no, it's no Nocturnus, but sometimes players like rare cards that are under $5 instead of $15+ Mythics. He'll have a place in many more budget-friendly Vampire decks. And again, I wonder what people would say about him other than "Not a good repalcement for Nocturnus."  
  
@Diacrhonos: I will explain better. I *love* this card. 5/5. I only wonder how he would compare without Nocturnus around because the first half a dozen comments I read about this card said he sucked because of Nocturnus and ranted at Wizards for not reprinting the aforementioned Mythic Rare. I love him regardless of Nocturnus; I'd never play an expensive mythic rare anyway. Over $10 is beyond my desire to pay for a single card.
posts.html:
I wonder how this card would have rated if it didn't have Vampire Nocturnus to live up to. I like this card; no, it's no Nocturnus, but sometimes players like rare cards that are under $5 instead of $15+ Mythics. He'll have a place in many more budget-friendly Vampire decks. And again, I wonder what people would say about him other than "Not a good repalcement for Nocturnus."

@Diacrhonos: I will explain better. I love this card. 5/5. I only wonder how he would compare without Nocturnus around because the first half a dozen comments I read about this card said he sucked because of Nocturnus and ranted at Wizards for not reprinting the aforementioned Mythic Rare. I love him regardless of Nocturnus; I'd never play an expensive mythic rare anyway. Over $10 is beyond my desire to pay for a single card.

Posted By: sarroth (7/26/2010 9:38:20 PM)

posts.post_content:
Wow...what great art...oh wait, I'm NOT a fourteen-year-old girl! FAIL!  
  
\*\*\*  
  
I said on [Barony Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Barony Vampire)'s comments that these two cards need to swap art. Her looks and her stance make her look sort of coy and flirty, but in a cold, vampiric way (how you'd imagine a "Captivating Vampire").   
  
THIS dude, on the other hand, fits Barony Vampire's flavor text remarkably well. His whole mien exudes the "creepy, bad-touch predator" thing that BV's text seems to imply. I'd definitely not let this guy within 1000 feet of an elementary school.
posts.html:
Wow...what great art...oh wait, I'm NOT a fourteen-year-old girl! FAIL!

***

I said on Barony Vampire's comments that these two cards need to swap art. Her looks and her stance make her look sort of coy and flirty, but in a cold, vampiric way (how you'd imagine a "Captivating Vampire").

THIS dude, on the other hand, fits Barony Vampire's flavor text remarkably well. His whole mien exudes the "creepy, bad-touch predator" thing that BV's text seems to imply. I'd definitely not let this guy within 1000 feet of an elementary school.

posts.post_content:
I'm a just kid that plays MTG, so this is the kind of artwork that scares me. Seriously, what's he about to do with that hand? I think I know, for one...  
  
That being said, I find it to be a pretty good card (although, seeing that I'm a kid, and a very casual player, that probably doesn't mean nil). Also, stop comparing it to [Vampire Nocturnus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nocturnus), because they are definitely not the same. Last I checked, one of them is a $17 mythic rare, while the other is a $2 rare that looks like some sort of child molester.  
  
*"Hey, kid. Would you like to come to my birthday party? Pants are optional."  
 - This guy*

Posted By: mrd8888 (10/2/2010 2:42:55 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
There is only one captivating vampire, and her name is [Drana](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drana), she could seduce anyone to the dark side.
  
This one...
  
The art is obviously horrible (I think even girls would find this guy creepy), and his ability will rarely be usable in competitive play, and he cannot replace nocturnus (well duh, noc is a 15$ mythic, this is a 2$ rare), but 3 CMC for a 2/2 that gives all your other vamps +1/+1 is nice indeed, and this is what matters, the other factors are just not important. I'd still like to hear what went through the artist's head when he drew this though.
